project_descr: Support to national level policy formulation, dialogue and consensus-building on disarmament, demobilisation and reintegration (DDR) in Sri Lanka.

outputs.output_descr: This project intends to strengthen UNDP's support to national level policy formulation, dialogue and consensus-building on DDR in Sri Lanka. The project will provide a platform for UNDP's engagement in DDR issues in Sri Lanka, specifically through the placement of short-term technical capacities within the Country Office, to provide substantive inputs to guide the national policy formulation process as well as guide UNDP's future involvement in the area. The project will also support activities aimed at building awareness and facilitating dialogue and consensus on DDR in Sri Lanka.
